name: 筆譯練習（中譯英）
description: This course is a practice-based training course designed to help students learn basic skills necessary for translating Chinese texts dealing with various topics and in different formats. Students’ self-study of relevant fields through weekly online reference materials provided will lead to the acquisition of key terminology and background knowledge.
goals: Students will be required to complete weekly translation exercise of about 700 Chinese characters long. At least 14 exercises during the term.
Students will sit for their mid-term and final exams to gauge progress and to help them develop translation competence under time pressure
Students will be required to compile a bilingual glossary of terms based on the assigned exercises, to be submitted after mid-terms and the end of the semester.

The course design will help students acquire basic translation skills necessary for higher-level professional translation courses. They shall also learn relevant terminology and conceptual background.
